MS MCQs

    Import standard library modules to add features to Python programs

    »

    1. What is a module?

      A package of code files that you install on your local computer.

      A list of dependencies that your code uses.

      A code file that can only be created by the Python development team.

      A code file with functions you can reference and call from your own code.


    2. What does the pip utility do?

      The pip utility will install packages from GitHub.

      The pip utility installs packages and their dependencies that are listed on the Python Package Index (PyPI).

      The pip utility will help you find packages to solve your programming problems.

      The pip utility installs packages from the Python standard library.
